[[File:Front radiograph of the lumbar spine with syndesmophytosis.jpg|vignette|Front radiograph of the lumbar spine with syndesmophytosis]]
[[File:Radiographie de profil du rachis lombaire.jpg|vignette|Radiographie du rachis lombaire avec syndesmophytose]]Syndesmophytes are thin, vertical bony structures between two vertebrae.

question.title: What are syndesmophytes?
question.description: What are the thin, vertical bony structures between two vertebrae?

option_a.title: Bone spurs
option_a.description: Abnormal growths on the surface of a vertebra

option_c.title: Osteophytes
option_c.description: Bony growths on the surface of a joint

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The first letter of the correct option
